TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Dai-ni, title = Dai-ni, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dai-ni} }

S.FORM: = Dai-ni = Gaga mniq Kawsyungsu Tawyuncyu ka alang Dai-ni. 59 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 173 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 166 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 7 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun 90%, Cou 2%, Paiwan 1%, Tayal 2%, Rukai1%, ni rahuq na o 1%. Pusu nniqan alang Pnyahan hangan Dai-ni nii ga kndadax tmciyuk Tanah Tunux siida, iyux dha gmgurah dxgal ka seejiq Nihunh pnhiyug na tqiyan ningpu dha ni snslian saw kingal alang. Nniqan alang Nyusan Kaw-syung taw-yuyeyn-cyu paw-san-ri. Gasuc Daya yayung Raw-nung-si. Tiri lnglingay Ska ayug ddgiyaq. Klegan seejiq nealang Bunun. Djiyun kari Kari Bunun ni Tlu. Pnyahan alang Saw hari mniq hngkawas 1920 (ta-cng hngkawas 9) siida, iyux gmgurah rnaaw ddgiyaq ka seejiq Nihunh, kndadax nyusan Taytung lnwanan seejiq Bunun yahan tnhjil hini, kika ni asi nniqun dha hraan hidaw yayung paw-ray ni gqian hidaw yayung pang-fu, hngkawas 2009(min-kwo 98) siida, tnmayan paru gbihur 88 siida, yasa lglug kana ka txgal sttu dha, niqan 40%sjiqun thjil nganguc kana da.

= Dai-ni = Gaga mniq Kawsyongso Tawyoncyo ka alang Dai-ni. 59 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 173 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 166 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 7 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bonon 90%, Coo 2%, Paiwan 1%, Tayal 2%, Rokai1%, ni rahoq na o 1%. Poso nniqan alang Pnyahan hangan Dai-ni nii ga kndadax tmciyok Tanah Tonox siida, iyox dha gmgorah dxgal ka seejiq Nihonh pnhiyog na tqiyan ningpo dha ni snslian saw kingal alang. Nniqan alang Nyosan Kaw-syong taw-yoyeyn-cyo paw-san-ri. Gasoc Daya yayong Raw-nong-si. Tiri lnglingay Ska ayog ddgiyaq. Klegan seejiq nealang Bonon. Djiyon kari Kari Bonon ni Tlo. Pnyahan alang Saw hari mniq hngkawas 1920 (ta-cng hngkawas 9) siida, iyox gmgorah rnaaw ddgiyaq ka seejiq Nihonh, kndadax nyosan Taytong lnwanan seejiq Bonon yahan tnhjil hini, kika ni asi nniqon dha hraan hidaw yayong paw-ray ni gqian hidaw yayong pang-fo, hngkawas 2009(min-kwo 98) siida, tnmayan paro gbihor 88 siida, yasa lglog kana ka txgal stto dha, niqan 40%sjiqon thjil ngangoc kana da.
